metadata.title: CVE-2018-14394 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
libavformat/movenc.c in FFmpeg before 4.0.2 allows attackers to cause adenial of service (application crash caused by a divide-by-zero error) witha user crafted Waveform audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavcodec59 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavdevice59 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavfilter8 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavformat-extra59 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavformat59 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libavutil57 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libpostproc56 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libswresample4 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
libswscale6 - 7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7:4.0.2-1ubuntu6').
